T02D2789:154b-0: @154b * // dpal thugs rje chen po gdug pa 'dul ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2789:154b-1: snying rje chen ldan sngags pa yis //
T02D2789:154b-2: shin tu gdug pa can gnas sam //
T02D2789:154b-3: mi srun skye bos gang ba'i gzhir //
T02D2789:154b-4: dpal ldan gdug pa 'dul mdzad bsgom //
T02D2789:154b-5: ji skad 'byung ba nyid dpal che //
T02D2789:154b-6: sna tshogs rin chen rgyan ldan pa //
T02D2789:154b-7: spyi bo 'od dpag med kyis spras //
T02D2789:154b-8: hr'i:yig ye shes snying po can //
T02D2789:154b-9: gsal byas de thugs nyi ma yi //
T02D2789:154b-10: 'khor lo rtsibs stong lha mchog stong //
T02D2789:154b-11: gdug pa 'dul phyir mnyam gzhag pa //
T02D2789:154b-12: rnal 'byor can gyis skad cig bskyed //
T02D2789:154b-13: spyi gtsug bshang sgo rdo rje'i rtse //
T02D2789:154b-14: sbu gu dkar po tal phyin dang //
T02D2789:154b-15: lte ba lte ba nyid yin te //
T02D2789:154b-16: de steng mgon po nyer mtshan pa'o //
T02D2789:154b-17: de dbus su ni rang sems hr'i: //
T02D2789:154b-18: khros pa drag po rab gnas bsam //
T02D2789:154b-19: brtse bas rtsal bskyed char 'phel bas //
T02D2789:154b-21: cho gas gtor ma sbyin byas la //
T02D2789:154b-22: de snying padmo gcig dbus h'um //
T02D2789:154b-23: gdug pa'i sems gang yin pa bskyed //
T02D2789:154b-24: cho ga gsum gyis de bsreg go //
T02D2789:154b-25: kun du sdang ba med nyid dang //
T02D2789:154b-26: ltos bral gcig tu snying brtse can //
T02D2789:155a-2: drin sdod de yis dgra rnams 'jig / gang tshe rmi lam nang du yang //
T02D2789:155a-3: byams sems zhugs pas snying g-yo zhi //
T02D2789:155a-4: gzhan na don mchi ma 'khrug 'gyur pa //
T02D2789:155a-5: de tshe gdug pa thul bar 'gyur //
T02D2789:155a-6: rlom sems dregs pa zhi pa dang //
T02D2789:155a-7: rtag tu byams ldan snying ston pa //
T02D2789:155a-8: mi de'i dam tshig zab mo ni //
T02D2789:155a-9: mchod sbyin byang chub sems bsnun bshad //
